snippet: The court upheld a five-year prison sentence for Anwar Ibrahim on Tuesday, effectively removing him as the linchpin of a fractious but ascendant opposition.
abstract: Malaysian court unanimously upholds sodomy conviction and five-year sentence for opposition leader Anwar Ibrahim, who accuses judges of political conspiracy; conviction amounts to culmination of 17-year power struggle between Anwar and the governing United Malays National Organization.
lead_paragraph: The court upheld a five-year prison sentence for Anwar Ibrahim on Tuesday, effectively removing him as the linchpin of a fractious but ascendant opposition.

headline.main: Malaysian Court Upholds Opposition Leader’s Sodomy Conviction
headline.print_headline: Malaysian Court Upholds Sodomy Conviction of Opposition Leader in Final Appeal
